title: PianoLedStrip
description: One physical LED strip connected to a Teensy 4.1.

ledPin.description: Teensy 4.1 data pin the strip is connected to (2–6).

totalLeds.description: Total number of LEDs on this strip.

stripToPianoLengthScale.description: Scale to match strip length to piano length (e.g., 1.68).

stripOrientation.description: LED addressing direction/orientation relative to the keyboard.

oneOf.description: Index 0 is leftmost; N-1 is rightmost.

Two stacked rows, L→R on the first, then R→L (middle index (N-1)/2 is rightmost).
Two stacked rows, R→L on the first, then L→R (middle index (N-1)/2 is leftmost).
